text: Ruth Anna Marie Schmidt (April 22, 1916 – March 29, 2014) was an American geologist and paleontologist. She created a United States Geological Survey (USGS) field office in Alaska and the first Department of Geology at the Anchorage Community College.Ruth A. M. Schmidt papers, 1912–2015. UAA/APU Consortium Library Archives and Special Collections, University of Alaska Anchorage. HMC-0792. Box 1, Folder 1. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American paleontologists Category:American geologists Category:Scientists from New York City Category:People from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Scientists from Alaska
title: Ruth A. M. Schmidt
